result.execSummary:
The defendant Bruce John Jasek was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Bruce John Jasek in court with attorney Matthew Curtiss Lein.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Joint recommendation; parties stipulate to facts; Defendant pleads NC to Ct. 1; court finds guilty and convicts on Ct. 1; Sentence fine/costs totaling $589.00 to be paid in 60 days. Advised of rights; plea questionnaire filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Bruce John Jasek
Current: PO Box 185, Radisson, WI 54867 United States  (Effective: 01-06-2015)
Prior: P.O. Box 185, Hayward, WI 54843 United States

Defendant Bruce John Jasek in court with Attorney Matthew Curtiss Lein.  John Martin Yackel appeared on behalf of Bruce Poquette for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Court enters NOT GUILTY plea on behalf of DE to Count 1.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.
